org.hazelwire.gui
Class ModsBookkeeper

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Observable
      org.hazelwire.gui.ModsBookkeeper

public class ModsBookkeeper
extends java.util.Observable

This class keeps track of all the Mods. It knows what Mods have been imported into the system, which Mods were selected by the user, which single Mod is currently selected and it knows all the configuration settings. Because this class is the central class for Module Selection, it has been made into an Observable.

Method Detail

getInstance

public static ModsBookkeeper getInstance()
This method checks whether an instance of ModsBookkeeper exists. Be that the case, it returns this instance. Otherwise, it calls the private constructor method, saves the newly created ModsBookkeeper and returns it. This method is synchronized in order to make sure that all parts of the system deal with an up to date ModsBookkeeper and that no information gets lost.

Returns:
the instance of ModsBookkeeper.

initMods

public void initMods(java.util.ArrayList<Mod> mods)
              throws java.io.IOException
This method initializes the ModsBookkeeper. It creates the lists needed to keep track of the selected Mods, sorts the Mods per Tag and creates a new ConfigFile.

Parameters:
mods - list of Mods that are already imported into the system.
Throws:
java.io.IOException

getSelectedMods

public java.util.ArrayList<Mod> getSelectedMods()
Returns:
the list containing all Mods the user has selected.

getModsPerTag

public java.util.HashMap<Tag,java.util.ArrayList<Mod>> getModsPerTag()
return the list containing all Mods that are in the system, sorted by Tag.

Returns:

isSelected

public boolean isSelected(java.lang.String modName)
Checks whether the Mod with the given modName is the currently selected Mod.

Parameters:
modName - a String consisting of the name of the Module that is checked.
Returns:
true if the Mod with name modName is the selected Mod, false otherwise.

selectModule

public void selectModule(java.lang.String modName)
This method selects the Mod with name modName and places it in the list of selected Mods. Afterwards, it notifies all Observers.

Parameters:
modName - the String consisting of the name of the Mod that is to be selected.

deselectModule

public void deselectModule(java.lang.String modName)
This method deselects the Mod with name modName and removes it from the list of selected Mods. Afterwards, it notifies all Observers.

Parameters:
modName - the String consisting of the name of the Mod that is to be deselected.

getModuleByName

public Mod getModuleByName(java.lang.String modName)

getTotalPoints

public int getTotalPoints()
This method computes the total amount of points the current selection of Mods is worth by summing the value of each mod.

Returns:
the total amount of points the current selection of Mods is worth.

getSelected

public int getSelected()
Returns:
the int representation of the selected Mod or -1, if no Mod is currently selected.

getSelectedMod

public Mod getSelectedMod()
Returns:
the Mod that is currently selected.

setSelected

public void setSelected(int selected)
This method sets the selected Mod to the given int value and notifies all Observers.

Parameters:
selected - int value representing the selected Mod. -1 means that no Mod is currently selected. x means that the Mod with index x-1 in selectedMods is selected.

getMods

public java.util.ArrayList<Mod> getMods()
Returns:
the list of all Mods that are imported into the system.

getConfigFile

public ConfigFile getConfigFile()
Returns:
the ConfigFile.
